CSV_cleaner package

Submodules

CSV_cleaner.cleaner module

CSV_cleaner.cleaner.cell_type_warnings(table)[source]

Check if cell type are consistent across columns

Check if the majority cell type is consistent with dtype (pandas dataframe). Note that str type is considered as equel to object type) Check if there are multiple types per column. Note: ignore NA

Parameters

table (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe to clean

Returns

dataframe with the majority type found per column and dtype of that same column pandas.DataFrame: dataframe with type count per column for column with more than one type

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

CSV_cleaner.cleaner.clean_column_name(table)[source]

Clean column names

put column names in lower case

remove “,”, “:”, “-”

remove spaces at the beginning and the end of the str

replace ‘_’ by ” “

Parameters

table (pandas dataframe) – dataframe to clean

Returns

a copy of the dataframe

Return type

pandas dataframe

CSV_cleaner.cleaner.clean_from_dict(table, dictionnary)[source]

Clean dataframe from a dictionnary

Parameters

  • table (pandas dataframe) – dataframe to clean

  • dictionnary (dict) –

    dictionnary must be:

    {“drop_col”: columns to drop as list, “replace”: dictionnary of str to replace (see pandas.DataFrame.replace()), rename: dictionnary of column to rename pandas.DataFrame.rename()}

Returns

a copy of the dataframe

Return type

pandas dataframe

CSV_cleaner.cleaner.clean_str_column(table)[source]

Clean string type cell of pandas dataframe

put str in lower case

remove “,”, “:”, “-”

remove spaces at the beginning and the end of the str

replace ‘_’ by ” “

Parameters

table (pandas dataframe) – dataframe to clean

Returns

a copy of the dataframe

Return type

pandas dataframe

CSV_cleaner.cleaner.get_unique_value_col(table, string=False)[source]

Computes unique value per column

Parameters

  • table (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe to use

  • string (bool, optional) – Compute unique value only for column of type str. Defaults to False.

Returns

return pandas dataframe with set of unique value and column name as index

Return type

pandas.DataFrame
